definition: where the wind and the waves are the fiercest/at the heart of the struggle
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: We are on the cuspof a major revolution.
sentences.chinese: 我們正處於一場重大變革的風口浪尖。

sentences.english: Tuyere Langjian the time, spokesmen for their products have become one of Dengjie.
sentences.chinese: 風口浪尖之時，其產品代言人鄧婕成了受過人之一。

sentences.english: America’s mortgage leaders are again at the center of a scandal.
sentences.chinese: 美國的抵押信貸機構又一次站在了醜聞的風口浪尖。
